items.name: rusty lever
items.description: A heavy iron lever, coated in rust. Looks like it fits into some kind of mechanism.

usability.effectDescription: You slide the rusty lever into the slot. With a grating screech, you pull it downwards. A loud *CLUNK* echoes from another room!

modifiesExit.setFailMessage: The northern gate groans open slightly.

items.name: lever slot
items.description: A heavy-duty slot mechanism is embedded in the wall, missing its lever.

rooms.name: Wine Rack Corner
rooms.description: This corner holds a dusty, old wine rack...

rooms.name: Under the Stairs
rooms.description: Directly beneath the rickety wooden staircase...

rooms.name: Gate Control Area
rooms.description: You are in a small, cramped area near the base of the main stairs. A heavy iron gate blocks passage north. There's a mechanism on the wall here with an empty slot.

conditionalDescriptions.description: You are in a small, cramped area... The heavy iron gate to the north stands slightly ajar. The lever in the mechanism beside it is now in the down position.

conditions.failMessage: The heavy iron gate to the north is securely locked. It seems operated by the nearby lever mechanism.

rooms.name: Upstairs Landing
rooms.description: You've passed the gate and reached the landing...
